Tubagus.title: Tubagus Laundry
label: Identity
Tubagus.clientDesc: Tubagus Laundry is a professional laundry service located in Bandung and Bekasi. Tubagus Laundry serves a variety of laundry needs, ranging from laundry, shuttle service, and laundry package.
Tubagus.workDesc: The clothes pin symbol gives the brand expression capturing the mission, vision and attitude. the green color was chosen to form a clean, fresh and fragrant laundry image.

Pipiltin.title: Pipiltin Cocoa
label: Packaging
Pipiltin.clientDesc: Pipiltin Cocoa is a local chocolate micro producer who introduce a high quality chocolate made from cocoa beans origination from Indonesia in a complete chocolate experience manner. Their products are varying from chocolate bar, pralines, macarons, whole cake, and avant garde plated desserts.
Pipiltin.workDesc: Pipiltin Cocoa made and processed their chocolate from scratch, using a variety of cocoa origins from Tabanan, Aceh, Banyuwangi and many others area in Indonesia. The idea of the chocolate bar packaging is to represent every aspect of the cocoa beans itself.

Studio 1212.title: Studio1212
label: Frontend
Studio 1212.clientDesc: Studio 1212 is a multi-disciplinary creative consulting agency that focuses on advertising, branding, identity building, editorial design, packaging, and product design.
Studio 1212.workDesc: Code and Develop at Mineral Studio

Katamama.title: Katamama
label: Frontend
Wordpress
Katamama.clientDesc: A Potato Head's sister hotel that promotes fine Indonesian craftsmanship in a modern setting. Located steps away from Potato Head's iconic Beach Club in Bali, every detail of Katamama hotel is handmande to reflect the remarkable crafts and traditions of Indonesia.
Katamama.workDesc: Code and Develop at Mineral Studio

Heavenlights.title: Heavenlights
label: Frontend
Heavenlights.clientDesc: Heavenlights is an Islamic fashion e-commerce that provides various kinds of the best products intended specifically for Muslim women, from clothing, veils, accessories and many others.

W Steak n Grill.title: W Steak n Grill
label: Identity
W Steak n Grill.clientDesc: W Steak n Grill is a steakhouse restaurant located in Yogyakarta that offers various type of high quality meat.
W Steak n Grill.workDesc: An elaborate visual identity aimed at showing strong and striking, with colors related to the product offered that are differentiated cuts of meat. An easy-to-read typography, the whole family being used for the distinction and hierarchy of each element within the material to be printed or digital.
